title: Mice thrive at 6700 meters up—higher than any mammals were thought able to live
description: Survey turns up several mouse species living on Andes peaks, breaking records for the highest dwelling mammals

title: First detailed U.S. scientific integrity draft policies get mixed responses
description: Watchdog groups point to holes in what health agencies say they plan to do

title: U.S. urges DNA synthesis firms to ramp up screening for biosecurity threats
description: Companies should more closely monitor orders for dangerous sequences and block unqualified customers, guidelines say—but they remain voluntary

title: Mice thrive at 6700 kilometers up—higher than any mammals were thought able to live
description: Survey turns up several mouse species living on Andes peaks, breaking records for the highest dwelling mammals
